data.name: Bankrupt Heroines 2 - Artworks Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 3 (will be more than 3) artworks
if players want more or different kind of artworks (eg. sketch) I will be working on it
as long as players contact me

This DLC enables cheats
press insert key (or F1 key)
type in

imlazy - unlocks all CGs
money - gives you money
data.about_the_game:
This DLC contains 3 (will be more than 3) artworks
if players want more or different kind of artworks (eg. sketch) I will be working on it
as long as players contact me

This DLC enables cheats

data.short_description: Let's be honest. I just want money buy this DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This product is an extra artwork (or an artbook) of the parent game. this includes a couple of nudes and sexual acts
